amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-366 as en bloc No. 2: Nos. 6 and 24.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 2 comprised of amendments numbered 6 and 24, printed in Part B of House Report 117-366.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al (TX) amendments (A003) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 202 - 217 (Roll no. 271).
